alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Humphreys; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:54AM CDT until June 16 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Holmes County in central Mississippi... Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Southern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 453 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Cary to near Redwood, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Holly Bluff around 500 AM CDT. Satartia around 510 AM CDT. Tinsley around 515 AM CDT. Yazoo City around 525 AM CDT. Benton and Eden around 530 AM CDT. Coxburg around 535 AM CDT. Ebenezer around 545 AM CDT. Pickens and Franklin around 550 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
